intro_text: The two siblings head out together, declaring a friendly competition to stock the fresh-kill pile. The wetlands might be as full of life as ever, but the extra motivation is really worth it to get over the unpleasantly cold water one has to stick one's paws into.
decline_text: Their mentors hold them back with a gentle word - the warriors have other plans for the apprentices today.

success_text.unscathed_common: app1 misses a w_tp_a_s, and app2 startles a pair of w_tp_a_p. They don't let it get them down, instead capturing a plump rabbit with a beautiful team ambush! But when they bring it back to camp, app1 tries to take sole credit for the prey, and instead of familial talent, it's familial discord that's displayed, as the apprentices get into a massive argument in the middle of camp.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c catches a great w_mp_a_s, and two w_tp_a_p! But their sibling comes up empty pawed. s_c offers to let them claim the smaller prey as their own, but the insulting suggestion just causes a massive argument.

fail_text.unscathed_common: The littermates end up dirty, exhausted, and without much more than a w_tp_a_s to show for it. Fox-dung! But at least out here, even if they didn't get much prey, they can complain about how stupidly hard hunting is to a sympathetic audience.
fail_text.injury: app1 takes a hard fall while swiping at a w_mp_a_s from a precarious perch, and the afternoon's hunt is called off as {PRONOUN/app1/poss} sibling helps {PRONOUN/app1/object} back to camp, chatting reassuringly about how hard their hunting lessons are.

intro_text: It's nice to get the chance to go out hunting with app2. app1 knows they're still in the apprentice den together, but their different mentors and focuses and skills - it's not the same as it was back in the nursery as littermates. Even the cold of the leaf-bare winds whipping through the trees just makes today a new and exciting adventure!
decline_text: Their mentors hold them back with a gentle word - the warriors have other plans for the apprentices today.

success_text.unscathed_common: Yeah, it's a relatively okay hunt, with a couple w_tp_a_p and a dirty w_tp_l_s. But what app1 is actually going to remember about today is that app2 thinks that {PRONOUN/app2/poss} mentor and app1's would make a cute couple!
success_text.stat_skill: It turns out s_c has really been listening to {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} mentor's tips for hunting - and {PRONOUN/s_c/subject}{VERB/s_c/'re/'s} willing to pass it on!

fail_text.unscathed_common: Together they manage a grand haul of one w_tp_l_s, and not even a very big w_tp_l_s at that. They have a lot more to learn before they'll all be ready to take on the responsibility of providing for c_n.

intro_text: As ice creeps over stagnant pools and the wetlands drip with frost, little of the background chatter of life still present, p_l is out on a hunting patrol with r_c.

success_text.unscathed_common: Three w_tp_l_p are nothing to sniff at in leaf-bare as a hunting success, but stars above being alone with r_c makes p_l feel like a kitten again. And not in the cute way either, in the chewing on tails, whiny, petty, immature way. Ugh.

intro_text: Sometimes, it's just nice to hang out with {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} sibling. Especially when the weather has kept them in camp too often recently!
decline_text: But sometimes, you get called back to camp instead. Ah well, another time!

success_text.unscathed_common: A scrubby w_tp_l_s, a bundle of w_tp_a_p, and a patrol spent retreading all their favorite in-jokes, it's a good day.
success_text.unscathed_rare: There's just something nice about hanging out with another warrior who'll always be there for {PRONOUN/r_c/object}, regardless of their similarities and differences. And they also bring back a good sized w_mp_l_s with some w_tp_a_p on the side for the fresh-kill pile.
success_text.stat_skill: It's easy to be proud of s_c, watching {PRONOUN/s_c/object} dive without a splash from the bank, popping up with prey in {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} jaws. Though sharing tongues afterwards is a necessity to warm up again.

fail_text.unscathed_common: They don't manage anything like the number of catches they were both expecting to get - a bit disappointing, even if they're not entirely empty-pawed.

intro_text: Sun's out, weakly shining, and r_c has been assigned a moderately tolerable hunting partner - {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} sibling!

success_text.unscathed_common: Watching r_c execute a fantastic leap to bring down a w_mp_a_s, p_l smiles. Does r_c remember the time {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} tried to do that as a kitten, and stood on {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} own tail? The siblings laugh about it as they move on to the next hunting ground.
success_text.unscathed_rare: It's been a while since they've been on a patrol alone together, and after they catch two w_mp_l_p for the fresh-kill pile r_c spends a bit just chasing p_l along the shoreline, batting at each other in a moment of silliness.
success_text.stat_skill: r_c jokes that {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} can't possibly be related to s_c - clearly s_c was born from eels, not cats, with the way {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} {VERB/s_c/glide/glides} through the water.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Sometimes, the prey just doesn't run, and today is one of those times.
fail_text.injury: r_c sees a fish {PRONOUN/r_c/subject}'d like for the fresh-kill pile, but while perched on a rock setting up a good pounce {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} slip  - {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/bob/bobs} to the surface and splutter {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} way to shore, but {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} breath comes short and wheezing after the freezing dunking. Fleas and ticks!

history_text.scar: r_c bears the scars from an unexpected cold dunking on a hunting patrol.
history_text.reg_death: r_c was killed by the cold dunking they got from a fall into the water in leaf-bare.
history_text.lead_death: were taken by an unexpected cold water dunking

intro_text: The hunting patrol heads out early, coats fluffed up against the cold.
decline_text: They encounter a dawn patrol on their way back to camp and join up with them instead.

success_text.unscathed_common: p_l grabs a salt-scented w_mp_a_s that {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} can barely carry, and r_c congratulates {PRONOUN/p_l/object}, secretly wondering if {PRONOUN/r_c/subject}'ll ever manage to surpass {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} sibling's achievements.
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c always feels like {PRONOUN/r_c/subject}{VERB/r_c/'re/'s} padding in p_l's footsteps, especially today, watching {PRONOUN/p_l/object} haul back a good catch of prey for the clan, a contribution that just about makes up for r_c's meagre offerings.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Sometimes, the prey just doesn't run, and today is one of those times.
fail_text.injury: r_c comes down with a crippling headache, making {PRONOUN/r_c/object} stagger, dizzy and weak, as {PRONOUN/r_c/subject}{VERB/r_c/'re/'s} helped back to camp.

intro_text: The siblings head out to one of the further hunting grounds among the swamps, a place dotted with tiny islands of higher ground, seeking dry land under their paws instead of half-frozen mud.
decline_text: They decide to bask for a bit instead of making the long walk.

success_text.unscathed_common: Together, they collect a couple w_tp_l_p and an old w_mp_l_s. It should be a great patrol, returning with reasonable prey in the harsh season - but r_c is acting obnoxious and {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} sibling has little time or patience for it.
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c makes a dumb comment that accidentally cuts deep. {PRONOUN/r_c/poss/CAP} sibling works with {PRONOUN/r_c/object} long enough to bring back sufficient prey - but no longer.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Today is just not their day.
fail_text.injury: The patrol tries to hunt, but r_c keeps stopping to duck behind bushes, until it's obvious that something is actually wrong. Eww.

intro_text: As ice creeps over stagnant pools and the wetlands drip with frost, little of the background chatter of life still present, p_l is out on a hunting patrol with their siblings.
decline_text: Actually, {PRONOUN/p_l/subject}'d rather try a land hunt. {PRONOUN/p_l/subject/CAP} wave {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} siblings off with a flick of {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} tail and {VERB/p_l/disappear/disappears} into the inland undergrowth.

success_text.unscathed_common: A w_mp_l_s and three w_tp_l_p is nothing to sniff at in leaf-bare as a hunting success, but stars above being alone with {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} siblings makes p_l feel like a kitten again. And not in the cute way either, in the chewing on tails, whiny, petty, immature way. Ugh.
success_text.unscathed_rare: The hunting patrol isn't very successful, yet matters not a whit to any of the warriors, because p_l makes a joke that {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} {VERB/p_l/think/thinks} is funny but that's always gotten on r_c's nerves and suddenly everyone's acting like apprentices again, snippy, immature, and irritable.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c nets them two healthy w_mp_a_p to take back to camp, but it only irritates {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} siblings. r_c never even got the chance to even try for a pounce, {VERB/r_c/are/is} {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} only there to carry around s_c's prey?

fail_text.unscathed_common: It isn't a very successful hunt - they'll have to head out again for more soon.
fail_text.injury: Perhaps hunting from the overhanging branches of a frost-swept tree wasn't their best moment, r_c concedes. The patrol has to hurry back to camp to warm {PRONOUN/r_c/object} up.

history_text.scar: r_c still shows where cold sunk its fangs into {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} after an unplanned leaf-bare swim.
history_text.reg_death: r_c was killed by cold water - not that the swim was planned.
history_text.lead_death: were taken by an unexpected cold water dunking

intro_text: Sometimes, it's just nice to hang out with {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} siblings. Especially when the weather has kept them in camp too often recently!
decline_text: But sometimes, you get called back to camp instead. Ah well, another time!

success_text.unscathed_common: A scrubby w_tp_l_s, a bundle of w_tp_a_p, and a patrol spent retreading all their favorite in-jokes, it's a good day.
success_text.unscathed_rare: There's just something nice about hanging out with other warriors who'll always be there for {PRONOUN/r_c/object}, regardless of their similarities and differences. And they also bring back a good sized w_mp_l_s with some w_tp_a_p on the side for the fresh-kill pile.
success_text.stat_skill: The siblings are proud of s_c, watching {PRONOUN/s_c/object} dive without a splash from the bank, popping up with prey in {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} jaws. Though sharing tongues afterwards is a necessity to warm up again.

fail_text.unscathed_common: They don't manage anything like the number of catches they were all expecting to get - a bit disappointing, even if they're not entirely empty-pawed.

intro_text: Sun's out, weakly shining, and r_c has been assigned a moderately tolerable hunting patrol - {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} siblings!
decline_text: Cancel that - a border patrol needs backup.

success_text.unscathed_common: Watching r_c execute a fantastic leap to bring down a w_mp_a_s, p_l smiles. Does r_c remember the time {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} tried to do that as a kitten, and stood on {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} own tail? The siblings laugh about it together as they move on to the next hunting ground.

Fleas and ticks!
